mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dongcode WHERE sidoName LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR gugunName LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR dongName LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" HAVING gugunName IS NOT NULL ORDER BY dongName LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM houseinfo WHERE apartmentName LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" LIMIT 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aptCode ORDER BY dealYear DESC, dealMonth DESC, dealDay DESC) AS recentDeal FROM housedeal NATURAL JOIN (SELECT * FROM houseinfo WHERE dongCode LIKE #{code}"%") AS houseinfo) AS deals WHERE recentDeal = 1 ORDER BY dealYear desc, dealMonth desc, dealDay desc LIMIT 20

SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aptCode ORDER BY dealYear DESC, dealMonth DESC, dealDay DESC) AS recentDeal FROM housedeal NATURAL JOIN (SELECT * FROM houseinfo WHERE lng BETWEEN #{start.lng} AND #{end.lng} AND lat BETWEEN #{start.lat} AND #{end.lat}) AS houseinfo) AS deals WHERE recentDeal = 1 ORDER BY dealYear desc, dealMonth desc, dealDay desc
